sub_title: Director of Operations EMEA at Seeing Machines. Our mission getting everyone home safely. We harness human factors science to create artificial intelligence (AI) technology that observes the driver’s attention.
summary: I'm a professional with an entrepreneurial mindset and passion for innovation and technology. After completing my MBA in digital business, I focused on gaining experience in the field of IoT and artificial intelligence (AI) based on computer vision and machine learning. In the past few years I have been involved in rolling out enterprise IoT/AI projects. My success has been linked to my ability to forge strong relationships with customers and add commercial value to the business.

education.degree_name: Cambridge Institute for Sustainability Leadership, Business Sustainability Management course

school.name: University of Amsterdam - Amsterdam Business School
University of Amsterdam - Amsterdam Business School

education.degree_name: Minor Business Administration: Designing Effective Organisations.

profile_positions.description: As a Director of Operations, I am passionate about driving business growth and optimizing operations. Leading cross-functional teams, developing strategies to expand successfully our footprint in the EMEA region and improving efficiency, reducing costs, and increasing profitability.
profile_positions.title: Director of Operations Europe, Middle East and Africa (EMEA)

profile_positions.description:
Our mission is to get everyone home safely. Seeing Machines is a world leader in human-machine interaction and an industry leader in the artificial intelligence (AI) technologies which enable machines to see, understand and assist the people who are using them. 

Vehicle accidents are caused by complex factors: human error, negligence, risky behavior, and unpredictable and unsafe conditions. With the world’s most holistic and integrated approach to driver safety technology, Seeing Machines is dramatically reducing transport related accidents every day, by mitigating some of the key the risks involved, to make the world a safer place.
profile_positions.title: Customer Success Manager Europe, Middle East and Africa (EMEA)

profile_positions.description:
As Customer Success Manager my main responsibility is to understand the customers’ business needs and drive commercial growth. Focused on IoT and AI project in Telematics, Smart home- and Buildings, Smart Security and IoT platforms. I build up strong relationships with customers, partners and stakeholders. I support our customers in defining partnerships and create roadmaps.

- Manage a portfolio of customers, actively working to ensure they are generating the maximum value 
- Provide valuable strategic input to address client challenges working in close partnership
- Drive commercial growth by lead generation and marketingplans
- Actively monitor customer performance to ensure key performance indicators are achieved and implement growth strategies to enhance performance.
- Act as the primary contact for customers 
- Onboard customers, assess training needs and implement training plans
- Lead delivery team and suppliers 
- Champion a culture of customer success in which every customer interaction is an opportunity to solve problems and strengthen the customer’s relationships
profile_positions.title: Customer Success Manager IoT and AI solutions

profile_positions.description:
As Program Manager I was responsible for the setup and rollout of several customers and international projects. This could vary from the implementation of a new company to upgrade solutions at excisting customers. To be ready for such projects, I've setting up the framework and standards for program- and project management at Hyrde, that creates the the baseline for future. The main role was to lead teams, people and processes to ensure customer implementations are delivered on time and produce the desired results.

- Planning the overall customer implementations and programs and monitoring the progress
- Coordinating the projects and their interdependencies
- Managing and utilize resources across projects, Help to recruit, coach, mentor and engage a team
- Managing stakeholders’ communication, foster strong collaborative relationships with suppliers and stakeholders
- Support a team who is focused on ensuring customer success through succesfull delivery and client satisfaction
profile_positions.title: Program Manager IoT and AI Solutions

profile_positions.description:
As Consultant IoT I've onboarded new customers for Hyrde and implemented IoT solutions. For my customers I was the primary point of contact for overall, operational, and technical questions during implementation. From this role I ensured an effective product onboarding and responsible for quickly understanding each employer’s business, customizing our onboarding process to exceed their expectations and realize a rapid time-to-value from their investment. Some key tasks: 

- Be the IoT expert, design a solution for the end customer 
- Connect with the sales team to understand the business case for each implementation.
- Implement a post-sale project plan to manage all onboarding, adoption, and roadmap for next steps
- Support our customers and troubleshoot technical issues reported by customers during the implementation process and provide solutions.
- Technical implementation plans in partnership with the customer to suit their requirements, and then guide them through this plan 
- Efficiently deliver enablement training and workshops to clients.
- Surface actionable feedback to our product + technical teams to inform future product developments.
profile_positions.title: Consultant Internet of Things (IoT)

profile_positions.description: Sourcing, recruiting and identifying top talent for the Audit & Assurance department, organizing Business Courses, Recruiting Events, Women Leadership Events, KNVB sponsorship recruitment events, Gamemaster Blockchain events, etc.), employer branding activities, project management, building and maintaining networks and relations with external partners.
profile_positions.title: Talent Acquisition Audit & Assurance
